name: Dimension Shifter!
description:
This is a game made for LM0B Beginners Game Jam #20

Please pay attention to the tutorial!!

Your job is to get back the holy grail that was stolen from you by the flesh monster! You have the ability to change the player's dimensions so they can fit through doors.

Art by: Valholl Studios

Code by: Liam_x220

Music and sounds from:

https://omegaosg.itch.io/gameboy-sfx-pack

https://jonathan-so.itch.io/creatorpack
